attributes.action: Stop wasting taxpayers money on the Plebgate affair
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you feel the Government should stop wasting taxpayers money on investigating the Andrew Mitchell affair.

Over £300k has now been spent on this investigation.
Money which could be spent on other more worthy causes.
I doubt we will ever know the truth. This is a playground "he said"  "she said" affair and should be STOPPED.
The police have better things to focus their efforts on. Maybe they did lie. Members of the cabinet also lie. We all lie.
I don't care anymore.
